document.heading: Rhode Island Avenue Metro Plaza Revenue Bonds Amendment Act of 2010

history.narrative: Law 18-344, the “Rhode Island Avenue Metro Plaza Revenue Bonds Amendment Act of 2010”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-10170. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 7, 2010, and December 21, 2010, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 12, 2010, it was assigned Act No. 18-689 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-344 became effective on March 31, 2010.
